items.title: DURABILITY
items.description: Steel House Frames have In-built Durability. Corrosion Protection is Built In.

items.title: DESIGN FLEXIBILITY
items.description: Steel adapts perfectly to cyclonic design requirements, and is equally at home in humid or cold climates.

items.title: ACCURACY
items.description: Because steel has consistent material strength and complies with strict quality controls and tolerances.

items.title: LESS DEFORMATION
items.description: LGS frame provides the strength, stiffness and geometric stability of the building.

items.title: COST-EFFICIENT
items.description: Factory pre-assembly will realise cost savings for your project in your labour budget.

items.title: TERMITE
items.description: Termite management is simplified. Termites cannot destroy the steel frame.
